entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Debugging services don't issue thread create callbacks for single file apps #77574
  • dotnet-trace: Make it easier to get a dump of what EventSources and Events are actually used by a process #77572
    8.0.0
  • [Experiment] Exception handling performance #77568
    8.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Allow `TimeOnly` as Dictionary key #77566
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Incorrect CodeView type information emitted for enums #77564
  • Consider shipping Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility with every servicing release #77557
  • PAX GEA constructor setting the name value to the unformatted string #77555
  • Consider making System.Threading.Thread.IsThreadStartSupported public #77541
  • [bug]incorrect alignment for elements in array #77539
  • Using the FileSystemWatcher control on 2 different PCs using a common folder. #77575
  • Null-Conditional operator not functioning correctlly in Razor/Blazor and debugging in Edge is dying sometimes. #77542
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by `object` schema #77536
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 8 Regressions on 10/25/2022 10:16:52 PM #77546
  • Regressions in Utf8/16 #77544
  • Regressions in Utf8/16 #77552
  • Regressions in Utf8/16 #77551
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_61104\\test61104\\test61104.cmd #77535
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic Type Resolving Issue #77532
    8.0.0
  • Discussion: Reducing confusion around the System.Runtime gc-heap-size EventCounter #77530
    8.0.0
  • [tests] SyndicationFeed_Load_Write_RSS_Feed failing on Wasm with tmp/ file already exists #77526
  • warning CS8785: Generator 'LoggerMessageGenerator' failed to generate source. #77525

Closed

  • RuntimeModule::ResolveLiteralField has unnecessary call to Type.GetFields() #45986
    Future
  • Memory leak in COM interop (IDispatch↔IReflect) #76350
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: XXH3 #75948
    8.0.0
  • [tests] TestIcuAppLocal failing to load app-local ICU on Windows x64 #77485
    8.0.0
  • Review .NET 5 usages #69028
    8.0.0
  • Proposal for high-performance codegen-less Reflection factory APIs #23716
    Future
  • Provide a way to create types from the MetadataLoadContext #56914
    Future
  • System.RuntimeType gives wrong Name and FullName for jagged multidimentional array. #45777
    Future
  • Debugging an xslt application doesn't work with .net core #45158
    Future
  • Returning stackalloc span inside local functions #77550
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure CLR Error on .NET 6.0 #76861
    8.0.0
  • Add DiagnosticSource.Write<T> API to assist with trimming #50454
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Bytemark/Bytemark/Bytemark.sh #77527
  • JSExport did not export top-level statements #77167
    8.0.0
  • JsonConverter<IPAddress> fails to work #72393
    Future
  • Breaking change in System.Text.Json.dll, infinite recursion in System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonConverter. Works fine in .NET 6 #75673
    7.0.x
  • FileInfo.CreateText and FileInfo.AppendText don't invalidate cache #77453
    8.0.0
  • [Memory consumption] Reduce memory consumption of filenames in CFileMappingImmutableData and CFileProcessLocalData #8728
    Future
  • StreamReader array allocations should be pool-able #77515
  • NativeAOT publish warning messages #64822
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add support for `DebuggerStepThrough` attribute #77318
    8.0.0
  • Implement the logic to support SoftwareWriteWatch in NativeAOT #77225
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Crash during gen1 GC #74355
    Future
  • Optional parameter addition should not be a breaking change if overload resolution is still possible (not ambiguous) #8490
    Future
  • [Perf] It is hard to keep the benchmarks in sync across different branches/releases. #9457
    Future
  • Post build events and the VS publish wizard #77311
  • Encapsulate gc write barrier size calculation for x64 #9041
    Future
  • Add back metadata specs files #36361
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Change HttpConnection.RegisterCancellation to use a strong reference #77573
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Change regMask_enum and regMaskTP to unsigned __int64_t on AMD64. #77571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Free `LOADERHANDLE` `DispatchMemberInfo` dtor #77570
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure, area-Tools-linker
  • Ensure delayed initialization of JsonArray/JsonObject is thread-safe #77567
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Move Interop code from System.Drawings.Common to Common directory #77565
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77563
    area-EnC-mono
  • Mark and expose additional Vector functions as Intrinsic #77562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Initial mobile workload testing (Closes: #75015) #77561
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix inconsistency in Regex infinite timeout usages #77560
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use char.IsAsciiLetter in the Regex runtime #77559
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove `palrt` from JIT and remove `memcpy` from PAL #77556
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #77549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] jest + optimize ManagedError #77547
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • unify error handling for FileStream and PipeClient Streams #77543
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update globalconfigs with recently added rules #77538
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Remove Vector128 checks for amd64 APIs #77534
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Release/7.0] Issue ICorProfiler ModuleLoadFinished callbacks for dynamic modules #77533
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.1

Merged

  • Free `LOADERHANDLE` `DispatchMemberInfo` dtor #77554
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use u8 in Utf8Formatter date formatting #77395
    area-System.Buffers
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix globalization test on Mono #77499
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Removing repeated line #77500
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary call to type.GetFields(), add test case for literalfield #77497
    area-System.Reflection
  • [PERF] Fix SOD and Startup builds for performance. #77519
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Workaround for msbuild issue in host tests #77524
    area-Host
  • [tests] Disable tests failing on runtime extra platforms #77487
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add DiagnosticSource.Write<T> API to assist with trimming #76395
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Scale back PGO and jit-experimental testing #77484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update `lvaEnregMultiRegVars` and `lvaEnregEHVars` when switching to MinOpts #77502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable emitting Vector64 SIMD intrinsics on Amd64 #77320
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Ignore ERROR_PIPE_NOT_CONNECTED in WindowsConsoleStream.Write #75734
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Slightly improve string unrolling for length 5 and 6 #77398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Extend list of unrecorded environment variables #77504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SR.Format instead of string.Format in Tar #77528
    area-System.IO
  • Fix more string.Format usage to SR.Format #77529
  • Invalidate FileInfo after CreateText and AppendText #77483
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify AppHost/ElfUtils #77208
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAny{Except}InRange in RegexCompiler / source generator #76859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Adding Readme.md for DirectoryServices.Protocols and Regex libraries #77418
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Fix documentation for GetFileLoadExceptionHandler #77518
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Optimize ManagedError ctor and (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Avoid reporting empty debug info ranges to the vm #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure JsonConverter<T>.Read/WriteAsPropertyName methods are user-callable. #77488
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Disable ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests for NativeAOT #77522
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one (backport of #73065) #77507
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoiding printing twice variable live range #77447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • perfcollect docs: run two commands instead of three #76325
    documentation, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix issue with spurious unproductive full GC which led to OOM. #77478
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Disable SIMD intrinsics for Vector128/64 on Arm64 #77443
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.1
  • Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #77425
    area-Host
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77355
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Migrate docker containers to latest tags #76630
  • [release/7.0] Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77437
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.x
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/6.0] Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77438
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Source-Build: Remove ILStrip dependency from mono #77503
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] optimize interop startup and linker hints #77256
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [build] Enable CodeQL with TSA #76751
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] browser profiler #77449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Change default value of TC_OnStackReplacement_InitialCounter to 200 #77498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to build multiple variants SxS #77427
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] double/float 64, RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds #2049

Updated

  • Green Thread Experiment #2057

PullRequests

Created

  • allow TYP_STRUCT for GT_RETURN - special case CNS_INT 0 initialization #2059

Merged

  • Transition to os thread on pinvoke #2053
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Change test for canStoreArgOnLlvmStack to typGetObjLayout/HasGCPtr #2052

Updated

  • New helper for green thread stack segments #2056
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mac OS .NET Incompatible Architecture Need ARM4e #28792
  • Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility.ValidatePackage task throws exception if PackageVersion has build metadata #28786

Closed

  • vsdbg memory leak #13065

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.101 #28795
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add unit tests for reserved aliases and host specific template data #28748

Updated

  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484
    Area-ILLink
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Constant errors regarding "Diagnostic Analyzer runner" crashing #65064
  • Assertion in nullable walker in speculation on switch expression #65061
    17.5
  • Completion seems broken (no entries in IntelliSense list) in most recent d17.4 #65060
  • Combination of MethodImpl and ref parameters confused IDE0060 rule #65062
  • Assertion in nullable walker (some nodes were not analyzed) #65056
    17.5
  • Assertion in nullable walker: "Did not find BoundCall in the map." #65053
    17.5
  • Assertion in nullable walker: "Did not find BoundBinaryOperator in the map." #65050
    17.5
  • Retargeting asserts when attribute forwarded in NoPia scenario #65048
    17.5
  • IntelliSense doesn't recognize auto-generated classes in referenced project #65044
  • `[Obsolete(null, error: true)]` is displayed as a warning. #65042
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `SymbolAnnotation.Create` #65041

Closed

  • RoslynDeployment on main branch isn't usable #64587
  • It looks like the "implement interface explicitly" option doesn't spit out static modifier for static events and properties. #61311
    17.4
  • "Introduce using statement" should remove unneeded "try...finally...dispose" #43001
    Backlog
  • 'Null check can be simplified' is offered on method group access and produces invalid code #53860
    Backlog
  • "Implement all members explicitly" action generates wrong code for static interface properties #58136
    17.3
  • 'Fix all in document' for 'Use expression body for operators' #41791
    Backlog
  • `and`/`or` should be colorized as keywords when matching enum #61246
  • Quick action "Save to 'as' expression" does not add spaces around "as" #60817
    17.4
  • StackOverflowException when too many using var used in one method (914 using var's) #47591
    Backlog
  • SA1210 is inconsistent with IDE's Remove and Sort Usings (casing) #59873
    Backlog
  • Quick Actions "Use pattern matching" after #endif directive adds extra #endif #59289
    Backlog
  • refactoring: invert condition for int? comparison errs #57124
    Backlog
  • Incorrect 'The variable 'X' is assigned but its value is never used' when constant is used in attribute of local function #60645
    Compiler.Next
  • Constant used in attribute on local function warns that it is unused #47619
    Backlog
  • potential fix leads to compilation error (IDE0059) #54037
  • VS2019 16.8.0-16.8.2 "Fade out unreachable code" is not working #49870
    Backlog
  • Compiler should warn on `foreach (ref T2 t2 in enumThatIsRefT1)` #61238
    Backlog
  • SymbolFinder.FindReferencesAsync doesn't find any references for the indexed property C# #40978
    Backlog
  • Definite assignment bug when not awaiting an async closure #43697
    17.5
  • Remove top empty line after Remove and Sort Usings #46625
    Backlog
  • VS2019 suggested switch expression while preview not enabled #41825
    Backlog
  • "Alias ambiguous type" order is inconsistent with "Fully qualify" #30838
    Backlog
  • Clicking rapidly on Intellisense suggestion box scroll arrows causes it to close unexpectedly #35457
    Backlog
  • How can I diagnose the problem of growing working set memory #64962
  • Inline temporary variable ignores try block #41594
    Backlog
  • ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider error #40656
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a race between AsyncQueue operations #65078
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix crash in 'fix all' for 'simplify conditional' #65077
    Area-IDE
  • Remove ILegacyIndentationManagerWorkspaceService #65076
    Area-IDE
  • Add ExternalAccess name recommender API for Pythia #65075
    Area-IDE
  • Do not move global-usings inside namespaces. #65074
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65073
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65070
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Improve trivia preservatio in Convert Switch Statement to Expression #65069
    Area-IDE
  • Log ProjectId instead of project path, so we can distinguish flavors in EnC logs #65068
    Area-Interactive
  • Automatic pool selection release/dev17.0 vs deps experiment 2 #65067
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not offer 'make field readonly' in structs that are overwritten #65065
    Area-IDE
  • Improve the location of compound assignment conversion errors #65059
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose constructor that allows for AnalysisOptions and a CancellationToken. #65051
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix issue in remove-unnecessary-cast with implicit-nullable-boxing casts #65047
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce amount of allocated MissingMetadataTypeSymbol symbols during various lookup operations. #65046
    Area-Compilers
  • Display lambda default parameter values in QuickInfo #65045
    Area-IDE
  • Fix generators not being added or removed correctly #65039
    Area-IDE
  • Fix generators not being added or removed correctly #65038
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Add EvaluationData.GetItemValues #65036
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for invert-if in iterators #65035
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65072
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve 'Introduce using statement' when the variable is already disposed #65052
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't offer 'use null propagation' with method groups #65058
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fixup implement-interface to properly support static interface methods #65063
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65057
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add back async streaming of results for DesignerAttributes (part2) #64908
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Update 17.4 version to preview 6 #64953
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65055
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • REmove complex diagnostic options and options changing reentrancy #64979
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #65054
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Disallow default parameter values in anonymous method expressions #64963
    Area-Compilers
  • Foreach ref assignment without identity conversion should give error #64879
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add support for finding indexer references used in an object initializer #65049
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #65024
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Allow `params` keyword completion in lambdas #65043
    Area-IDE
  • Sort the options we give back in 'alias ambiguous type' #64997
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65040
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters (#64680)" #64986
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65037
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65034
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Remove "System.Threading.Channels" from vsix #65028
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic snippets - updates option names #64814
    Area-IDE
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Consistently extract synthesized delegate info from method symbol #64966
    Area-Compilers
  • Check escape after converting #64976
    Area-Compilers
  • Add brace-matching support for block comments #65014
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional cases to match when simplifying delegate invokes #65010
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Extend pattern explainer for more complicated graphs #65002
    Area-Compilers
  • Make instructions for STE a live region for screen readers #64988
    Area-IDE
  • Complete move to net70 ref assemblies #64833
    Area-Compilers
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add A/B flag to test removing recoverable assembly-metadata in VS. #64948
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add lambda `params` mismatch error #64961
    Area-Compilers
  • Reuse `LambdaSymbol` when inferring delegate type #65003
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UseUrls equivilant API for Http and Https ports #44772
  • [Blazor] Unexpected component initialization #44766
  • Large API requests fail on Kubernetes Linux container with read-only file system #44765
  • Blazor Webassembly always getting ERR_CONNECTION_RESET #44763
  • Monitor HTTP response buffer to detect lagging #44761
  • "AspNetCore.HealthChecks.SqlServer": "6.0.2" vulnerability package #44760
  • API proposal: Add ReadOnlySpan<byte> to IDataProtector (un)Protect #44758

Closed

  • Allow Blazor wasm in vscode webview from extension #26790
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .Net 7 Razor Class Library Localization #44655
  • Blazor / SEO / index in search engines #44750
  • SignalR Clients connection #44489
  • Hosting Service Bus Consumer in a Web API Project #44507
  • Default Kestrel's Http2Limits.MaxRequestHeaderFieldSize to 32KB like MaxRequestHeadersTotalSize #12213
    8.0-preview1
  • .NET 7.0 RC2 breaks MVC build where a view references an F# model #44749
  • .NET6 Blazor Server - using 'ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute = false' forces UI Component to Reinitialize? #44658
  • AspNetCore WASM crashes with valid access token: `null_or_empty_id_token: The idToken is null or empty` #30014
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #33622 #44771
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Use the Regex source generator in the AlphaRouteConstraint. #44770
    area-runtime
  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #44768
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Design time type converters return false for CanConvertFrom(typeof(string)) #10968
  • Navigation.TitleView/Title doesn't work #10965
  • MenuFlyoutItem should have a FlyoutItemIsVisible property #10961
    Backlog
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible should accept a "BindableObject" (i.e. it should be data bound) #10960
  • iOS Blazor app crashes with TargetPlatformVersion=15.4 #10958
  • Grid row height not calculated correctly when set to auto and used with multiple columns of width * #10956
    Backlog
  • Cannot deploy windows when referencing net6 and ApplicationDisplayVersion < 1.0 #10953
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain version 6.0.11... is not found in NuGet feeds" #10952

Closed

  • AAB-files get signed, but not APK-files #10872
  • ContentView inside Carouselview results in error #10963
  • IconImageSource not using FontFamily for correct image #10673
  • iOS: SwipeView placed in Border doesn't display #8774
  • Grid rows within CollectionView are all blank (only in Release mode) #9275
  • Frame.CornerRadius not working on iOS #10643
    Backlog
  • Publish Maui app as exe not work on window 10 #10938
  • WebView Cancel not working #8611
  • BlazorWebView CSS is only applied to Windows app but not Android #5750

PullRequests

Created

  • [foldable] XML doc additions #10972
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10950
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Update Microsoft.Maui-mac.slnf #10954
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Design time converters should return TRUE for CanConvertFrom string #10969
  • Cherrypick fron net7 to release branch #10957
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update .NET 6 MAUI version #10962
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Dispose empty sets and try/catch exceptions #10955
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.9 to 1.0.0.10 #10935
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.2 to 1.4.0.3 #10932
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.7.0 to 1.7.0.1 #10930
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.7 to 1.2.1.8 #10929
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.1 to 1.5.1.1 #10928
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.14 to 1.0.0.15 #10927
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • If a UISwitch grows too wide it is no longer accessible #10946
    area/a11y
  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948
    t/breaking 💥, area/a11y, area/gestures
  • 1100-Enhancement-DatePicker-supports-nullable-(Selected)-Date #9727
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Extract Maps, Graphics & Foldable docs during build #10909
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-27
entry.content:

  • MinAsync and MaxAsync on an empty sequence. #29447
  • Throw more specific exceptions from ShapedQueryCompilingExpressionVisitor #29446

Closed

Created
